sub_title: Projectcoordinator Architecture at NACO, Netherlands Airport Consultants B.V.
summary:
NACO, Netherlands Airport Consultants B.V. is one of the world's leading independent airport consultancy and engineering firms offering integrated, full-service planning and design services. 

Lead building engineer and project coördinator with airport knowledge. I am motivated to contribute to sustainable and climate resilient airports and buildings. Developments and our natural environment go hand in hand to create sustainable societies. With an interdisciplinary approach with insight to any environmental, economic and spatial issues and the opportunities in the needs of the clients  and those impacted by our choices.

Experienced, enthusiastic and committed projectcoördinator with BIM knowledge. Has a broad experience of more than 20 years in different architectural fields. Hard worker, designer, independent, drive, endurance, pragmatic and open.

Overview of past and current roles:
- Project Coördinator
- Building Engineer
- Owner Hijma Architecture
- Consultant

International experience: Offices Luxumbourg, Aruba Airport, St-Eustatius Airport, Dar-es-Salam Airport, Banjul Airport, Munda Airport, St-Maarten Airport. 

Market experience: Airports, Leisure, Commercial Buildings, Housing, Offices. 

Specialties: Translate concepts to feasible and realizable buildings, Airport consultant, Sustainability, Circular Design.
